name: Orange, Walnut, Gorgonzola and Mixed Greens Salad with Fresh Citrus Vinaigrette
author: FAITHFUL96
summary: A tasty summery salad made with fresh oranges, red onions, glazed walnuts, and Gorgonzola cheese, then topped with a homemade citrus vinaigrette! Easy and delicious!
ingredients: 10 ounces mixed salad greens with arugula
2  large navel oranges, peeled and sectioned
directions: Place the walnuts in a skillet over medium heat
Cook 5 minutes, stirring constantly, until lightly browned
In a large bowl, toss the toasted walnuts, salad greens, oranges, and red onion
In a large jar with a lid, mix the olive oil, vegetable oil, orange juice, sugar, vinegar, mustard, oregano, and pepper
Seal jar, and shake to mix
Divide the salad greens mixture into individual servings
To serve, sprinkle with Gorgonzola cheese, and drizzle with the dressing mixture
